welcome_message_body: "Welcome to charming Kendall West, known for its beautiful landscapes and friendly community. We invite you to explore and experience all that our city has to offer. Enjoy your stay!"

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Tamiami Airport serves domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Tamiami Airport caters to private and chartered flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Central Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal of Miami International Airport, serving domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: North Terminal
terminals.description: A terminal dedicated to serving international flights, with a focus on Latin America and the Caribbean.

terminals.name: South Terminal
terminals.description: A terminal primarily used by low-cost carriers and serving domestic and international flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport, but it may require reconnection every 30 minutes.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Opa Locka Airport, serving both commercial and private flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: A separate terminal for private and chartered flights, providing a more exclusive and personalized experience.

wifi.note: Complimentary WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: This terminal serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: This terminal handles all cargo and freight operations.
